8 67 130 786 783 746 728 762 770 721 613 584 525 17,999 18,134 17,787 17,575 17,906 18,367 18,736 17,061 13,568 10,854 9,329   ## p. 622 (#646) ############################################  Appendix 9 Aircraft in the European Theater of Operations June 1942 to August 1945 1942 1943 Jun Jul Aug Sep Oct Nov Dec Jan Combat Airplanes 1st Line 283 401 445 879 840 823 739 2nd Line 9 24 24 24 28 19 24 24 Total 9 307 425 469 907 859 847 763 Heavy Bombers 1st Line 1 B-17 ## 44 104 178 296 247 219 214 44 104 144 234 180 178 175 B-24 34 62 67 41 39 2nd Line I Total 44 104 178 296 247 219 214 Medium Bombers 1st Line B-25 $$ 10 61 44 29 19 9 33 34 23 13 1 28 10 6 6 - 10 61 44 29 19 221 B-26 2nd Line Total Light Bombers 1st Line A-20 A-26 2nd Line Total Fighters 1st Line 24 24 9 24 99 2224 69 18 9 18 33 33 33 ∞ ∞ 8 6 8 6 2333423 24 11 8 10 42 44 16 16 P-38 P-39 P-40 P-47 239 295 235 484 495 516 458 80 131 133 184 138 168 163 177 251 177 102 88 120 P-51 Night Fighters Other 159 164 102 123 106 83 73 2nd Line Total 239 295 235 484 495 516 458 Reconnaissance 1st Line F-4, F-5 22 F-6 F-8 Other 2nd Line Total Grand Total* 13 20 21 51 42 13 20 21 15 18 10 36 14 4 8 16 14 2 13 24 29 67 56 9 359 520 588 1,100 932 944 860 20 *Includes other aircraft not shown (transports, trainers, and communications aircraft.)   ## p. 623 (#647) ############################################  1943 Feb Mar Apr May Jun Jul Aug Sep Oct Nov Dec 781 718 1,047 1,213 1,613 1,826 2,177 2,485 2,936 3,708 4,111 24 11 29 47 58 69 98 134 127 127 805 729 1,076 1,260 1,671 1,895 2,275 2,619 3,063 3,835 131 4,242 255 303 590 692 834 844 895 931 1,104 1,460 1,610 186 229 502 599 783 820 786 835 907 1,166 1,302 69 74 88 93 51 24 109 96 197 294 308 13 12 12 12 40 34 94 76 255 303 590 705 846 856 907 971 1,138 1,554 1,686 17 18 54 121 336 450 493 484 479 467 443 4 1 1 1 1 1 1 13 17 53 120 335 449 492 484 479 467 443 1 1 1 1 17 18 54 121 336 450 493 485 480 468 444 6 2 6 2 10 9 16 11 432 358 100 56 2228 2227 33 33 33 33 33333
